messages.perfil: Hello!, my name is Dayana Betancur, a technician and technologist in computer systems, with experience in web development projects and applications made with angular, react native, .net and sql, I have also worked on my own projects using vue.js, javascript, typescript, bootstrap, sass, among others. Programming is the professional field in which I am most involved, however I have knowledge in artistic areas such as music, drawing and sports that allow me to have a balance and creative capacity in the development of programming projects. I am passionate about creating, developing, sharing, listening, to in the not too distant future benefit other people in the workplace through technology, and improve the quality of life.
messages.descripcionLink: Here you can see some of the projects I have in constant updating and improvement, I work in javascript, typescript and responsive design, relating the front-back-bd to my complete repository ðŸ‘‰

Among some other digital tools for wireframes creation I have experience in:
